00147 static void pm_set_osc0_mode(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int mode)
00148 {
00149   // Read
00150   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0_t u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0 = {pm->oscctrl0};
00151   // Modify
00152   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.OSCCTRL0.mode = mode;
00153   // Write
00154   pm->oscctrl0 = u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.oscctrl0;
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 void pm_enable_osc0_ext_clock(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00159 {
00160   pm_set_osc0_mode(pm, AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_EXT_CLOCK);
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 void pm_enable_osc0_crystal(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int fosc0)
00165 {
00166   pm_set_osc0_mode(pm, (fosc0 <  900000) ? AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_CRYSTAL_G0 :
00167                        (fosc0 < 3000000) ? AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_CRYSTAL_G1 :
00168                        (fosc0 < 8000000) ? AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_CRYSTAL_G2 :
00169                                            AVR32_PM_OSCCTRL0_MODE_CRYSTAL_G3);
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 void pm_enable_clk0(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int startup)
00174 {
00175   pm_enable_clk0_no_wait(pm, startup);
00176   pm_wait_for_clk0_ready(pm);
00177 }
00178 
00179 
00180 void pm_disable_clk0(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00181 {
00182   pm->mcctrl &= ~AVR32_PM_MCCTRL_OSC0EN_MASK;
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 void pm_enable_clk0_no_wait(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int startup)
00187 {
00188   // Read register
00189   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0_t u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0 = {pm->oscctrl0};
00190   // Modify
00191   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.OSCCTRL0.startup = startup;
00192   // Write back
00193   pm->oscctrl0 = u_avr32_pm_oscctrl0.oscctrl0;
00194 
00195   pm->mcctrl |= AVR32_PM_MCCTRL_OSC0EN_MASK;
00196 }
00197 
00198 
00199 void pm_wait_for_clk0_ready(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00200 {
00201   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_OSC0RDY_MASK));
00202 }

00308 
00309 void pm_enable_clk32_no_wait(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int startup)
00310 {
00311   // Read register
00312   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32_t u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32 = {pm->oscctrl32};
00313   // Modify
00314   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32.OSCCTRL32.osc32en = 1;
00315   u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32.OSCCTRL32.startup = startup;
00316   // Write back
00317   pm->oscctrl32 = u_avr32_pm_oscctrl32.oscctrl32;
00318 }

00327 void pm_cksel_get(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned long *p_cksel)
00328 {
00329   *p_cksel = pm->cksel;
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 void pm_cksel_set(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned long cksel)
00334 {
00335   pm->cksel = cksel;
00336 
00337   // Wait for ckrdy bit and then clear it
00338   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_CKRDY_MASK));
00339 }
00340 
00341 
00342 void pm_cksel(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00343               unsigned int pbadiv,
00344               unsigned int pbasel,
00345               unsigned int pbbdiv,
00346               unsigned int pbbsel,
00347               unsigned int hsbdiv,
00348               unsigned int hsbsel)
00349 {
00350   u_avr32_pm_cksel_t u_avr32_pm_cksel = {0};
00351 
00352   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.cpusel = hsbsel;
00353   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.cpudiv = hsbdiv;
00354   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.hsbsel = hsbsel;
00355   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.hsbdiv = hsbdiv;
00356   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbasel = pbasel;
00357   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbadiv = pbadiv;
00358   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbbsel = pbbsel;
00359   u_avr32_pm_cksel.CKSEL.pbbdiv = pbbdiv;
00360 
00361   pm->cksel = u_avr32_pm_cksel.cksel;
00362 
00363   // Wait for ckrdy bit and then clear it
00364   while (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_CKRDY_MASK));
00365 }

00368 void pm_gc_setup(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00369                   unsigned int gc,
00370                   unsigned int osc_or_pll, // Use Osc (=0) or PLL (=1)
00371                   unsigned int pll_osc, // Sel Osc0/PLL0 or Osc1/PLL1
00372                   unsigned int diven,
00373                   unsigned int div)
00374 {
00375   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl_t u_avr32_pm_gcctrl = {0};
00376 
00377   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.oscsel = pll_osc;
00378   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.pllsel = osc_or_pll;
00379   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.diven  = diven;
00380   u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.GCCTRL.div    = div;
00381 
00382   pm->gcctrl[gc] = u_avr32_pm_gcctrl.gcctrl;
00383 }
00384 
00385 
00386 void pm_gc_enable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00387                   unsigned int gc)
00388 {
00389   pm->gcctrl[gc] |= AVR32_PM_GCCTRL_CEN_MASK;
00390 }
00391 
00392 
00393 void pm_gc_disable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00394                    unsigned int gc)
00395 {
00396   pm->gcctrl[gc] &= ~AVR32_PM_GCCTRL_CEN_MASK;
00397 }

00400 void pm_pll_setup(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00401                   unsigned int pll,
00402                   unsigned int mul,
00403                   unsigned int div,
00404                   unsigned int osc,
00405                   unsigned int lockcount)
00406 {
00407   u_avr32_pm_pll_t u_avr32_pm_pll = {0};
00408 
00409   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllosc   = osc;
00410   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.plldiv   = div;
00411   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllmul   = mul;
00412   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllcount = lockcount;
00413 
00414   pm->pll[pll] = u_avr32_pm_pll.pll;
00415 }
00416 
00417 
00418 void pm_pll_set_option(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00419                        unsigned int pll,
00420                        unsigned int pll_freq,
00421                        unsigned int pll_div2,
00422                        unsigned int pll_wbwdisable)
00423 {
00424   u_avr32_pm_pll_t u_avr32_pm_pll = {pm->pll[pll]};
00425   u_avr32_pm_pll.PLL.pllopt = pll_freq | (pll_div2 << 1) | (pll_wbwdisable << 2);
00426   pm->pll[pll] = u_avr32_pm_pll.pll;
00427 }
00428 
00429 
00430 unsigned int pm_pll_get_option(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00431                                unsigned int pll)
00432 {
00433   return (pm->pll[pll] & AVR32_PM_PLLOPT_MASK) >> AVR32_PM_PLLOPT_OFFSET;
00434 }
00435

00437 void pm_pll_enable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00438                   unsigned int pll)
00439 {
00440   pm->pll[pll] |= AVR32_PM_PLLEN_MASK;
00441 }
00442 
00443 
00444 void pm_pll_disable(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm,
00445                   unsigned int pll)
00446 {
00447   pm->pll[pll] &= ~AVR32_PM_PLLEN_MASK;

00463 unsigned long pm_get_clock(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00464 {
00465   u_avr32_pm_mcctrl_t u_avr32_pm_mcctrl = {pm->mcctrl};
00466   return u_avr32_pm_mcctrl.MCCTRL.mcsel;
00467 }
00468 
00469 
00470 void pm_switch_to_clock(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned long clock)
00471 {
00472   // Read
00473   u_avr32_pm_mcctrl_t u_avr32_pm_mcctrl = {pm->mcctrl};
00474   // Modify
00475   u_avr32_pm_mcctrl.MCCTRL.mcsel = clock;
00476   // Write back
00477   pm->mcctrl = u_avr32_pm_mcctrl.mcctrl;
00478 }
00479 
00480 
00481 void pm_switch_to_osc0(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned int fosc0, unsigned int startup)
00482 {
00483   pm_enable_osc0_crystal(pm, fosc0);            // Enable the Osc0 in crystal mode
00484   pm_enable_clk0(pm, startup);                  // Crystal startup time - This parameter is critical and depends on the characteristics of the crystal
00485   pm_switch_to_clock(pm, AVR32_PM_MCSEL_OSC0);  // Then switch main clock to Osc0
00486 }

00489 void pm_bod_enable_irq(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00490 {
00491   pm->ier = AVR32_PM_IER_BODDET_MASK;
00492 }
00493 
00494 
00495 void pm_bod_disable_irq(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00496 {
00497   bool global_interrupt_enabled = cpu_irq_is_enabled();
00498 
00499   if (global_interrupt_enabled) cpu_irq_disable();
00500   pm->idr = AVR32_PM_IDR_BODDET_MASK;
00501   pm->isr;
00502   if (global_interrupt_enabled) cpu_irq_enable();
00503 }
00504 
00505 
00506 void pm_bod_clear_irq(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00507 {
00508   pm->icr = AVR32_PM_ICR_BODDET_MASK;
00509 }
00510 
00511 
00512 unsigned long pm_bod_get_irq_status(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00513 {
00514   return ((pm->isr & AVR32_PM_ISR_BODDET_MASK) != 0);
00515 }
00516 
00517 
00518 unsigned long pm_bod_get_irq_enable_bit(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00519 {
00520   return ((pm->imr & AVR32_PM_IMR_BODDET_MASK) != 0);
00521 }
00522 
00523 
00524 unsigned long pm_bod_get_level(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm)
00525 {
00526   return (pm->bod & AVR32_PM_BOD_LEVEL_MASK) >> AVR32_PM_BOD_LEVEL_OFFSET;
00527 }

00541 
00542 long pm_enable_module(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned long module)
00543 {
00544   unsigned long domain = module>>5;
00545   unsigned long *regptr = (unsigned long*)(&(pm->cpumask) + domain);
00546 
00547   // Implementation-specific shortcut: the ckMASK registers are contiguous and
00548   // memory-mapped in that order: CPUMASK, HSBMASK, PBAMASK, PBBMASK.
00549 
00550   *regptr |= (1<<(module%32));
00551 
00552   return PASS;
00553 }
00554 
00555 long pm_disable_module(volatile avr32_pm_t *pm, unsigned long module)
00556 {
00557   unsigned long domain = module>>5;
00558   unsigned long *regptr = (unsigned long*)(&(pm->cpumask) + domain);
00559 
00560   // Implementation-specific shortcut: the ckMASK registers are contiguous and
00561   // memory-mapped in that order: CPUMASK, HSBMASK, PBAMASK, PBBMASK.
00562 
00563   *regptr &= ~(1<<(module%32));
00564 
00565   return PASS;
00566 }
